results.title: Bob Dole Congressional Gold Medal Act
results.short_title: Bob Dole Congressional Gold Medal Act
results.latest_major_action: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The expanded summary of the Senate passed version is repeated here.) Bob Dole Congressional Gold Medal Act  (Sec. 3) This bill directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senate to arrange for the award of a Congressional Gold Medal to Bob Dole in recognition for his service to the nation as a soldier, legislator, and statesman.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The expanded summary of the Senate passed version is repeated here.) Bob Dole Congressional Gold Medal Act  (Sec. 3) This bill directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senate to arrange for the award of a Congressional Gold Medal to Bob Dole in recognition for his service to the nation as a soldier, legislator, and statesman.
